actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide price support for producers of sunflower seeds through loans and purchases by the Secretary of Agriculture.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make available price supports to producers of sunflower seeds. Requires the Secretary to make available loans and purchases on the 1980 and 1981 crops at a level which is fair and reasonable in relation to the level available for soybeans. Prohibits the Secretary from requiring a set-aside of sunflower seed acreage as a condition to such price support.

titles.title: A bill to provide price support for producers of sunflower seeds through loans and purchases by the Secretary of Agriculture.
